snippet.title: Space Captain McCallery Preview Trailer
snippet.description:
From the developer of Cold Vengeance and Kill the Superweapon comes Sci-Fi Action-Adventure game Space Captain McCallery!  Now Available!

Steam: https://www.reddit.com/r/indiegames/comments/90i68q/space_captain_mccallery_lowpoly_actionadventure/
Itch: https://malec2b.itch.io/space-captain-mccallery-ep-1-crash-landing

Captain McCallery's crew has mutinied and stranded him on an alien world.  He must use his wits and reflexes to survive a hostile environment and find a way to get back to space.

Website: http://renegadesector.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/malec2b
Tumblr: http://renegadesector.tumblr.com/
